languages.text: "Я желал вернуться к наставнику и разделить с ним его судьбу, но конклав признал меня раскаявшимся, после чего направил на станцию Алтарь-Темплум-Каликсис-Экс-17, где я должен был искупать прежние заблуждения".

traits.locale_text: "Я желал вернуться к наставнику и разделить с ним его судьбу, но конклав признал меня раскаявшимся, после чего направил на станцию Алтарь-Темплум-Каликсис-Экс-17, где я должен был искупать прежние заблуждения".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "I wanted to return to my mentor and share his fate, but the conclave found me repentant and sent me to the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 where I was to atone for my previous transgressions."
languages.original_text: "Я желал вернуться к наставнику и разделить с ним его судьбу, но конклав признал меня раскаявшимся, после чего направил на станцию Алтарь-Темплум-Каликсис-Экс-17, где я должен был искупать прежние заблуждения".

traits.locale_text: "I wanted to return to my mentor and share his fate, but the conclave found me repentant and sent me to the station Altar-Templum-Kalixis-X-17 where I was meant to atone for my previous transgressions."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I wanted to return to my mentor and share his fate, but the conclave found me repentant and sent me to the station Altar-Templum-Kalixis-X-17 where I was meant to atone for my previous transgressions."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I wanted to return to my mentor and share his fate, but the conclave found me repentant and sent me to the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 where I was to atone for my previous transgressions."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I wanted to return to my mentor and share his fate, but the conclave found me repentant and sent me to the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 where I was to atone for my previous transgressions."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I wanted to return to my mentor and share his fate, but the conclave found me repentant and sent me to the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 where I was to atone for my previous transgressions."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我想回到我的导师身边，与他迎接同样的命运。但修会认为我之前的行为是在悔过，于是命令我前往卡利西斯祭坛17号星站，让我在那里效力，为我犯下的过错赎罪。”
languages.original_text: "I wanted to return to my mentor and share his fate, but the conclave found me repentant and sent me to the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 where I was to atone for my previous transgressions."

traits.locale_text: “我想回到我的导师身边，与他迎接同样的命运。但修会认为我之前的行为是在悔过，于是命令我前往卡利西斯祭坛17号星站，让我在那里效力，为我犯下的过错赎罪。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Quería volver con mi mentor para compartir su destino, pero el cónclave consideró que me arrepentía y me asigno a la estación Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, donde debía expiar mis anteriores transgresiones».
languages.original_text: "I wanted to return to my mentor and share his fate, but the conclave found me repentant and sent me to the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 where I was to atone for my previous transgressions."

traits.locale_text: «Quería volver con mi mentor para compartir su destino, pero el cónclave consideró que me arrepentía y me asigno a la estación Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, donde debía expiar mis anteriores transgresiones».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「私は師のもとに戻り、運命を共にしたかった。しかし、評議会は私が悔い改めていることを知り、以前の罪を償うために、私をアルター・テンプラム・カリクシス-Ext-17のステーションに送ったのだ」
languages.original_text: "I wanted to return to my mentor and share his fate, but the conclave found me repentant and sent me to the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 where I was to atone for my previous transgressions."

traits.locale_text: 「私は師のもとに戻り、運命を共にしたかった。しかし、評議会は私が悔い改めていることを知り、以前の罪を償うために、私をアルター・テンプラム・カリクシス-Ext-17のステーションに送ったのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich wollte zu meinem Mentor zurückkehren und sein Schicksal teilen, doch die Konklave stufte mich als reumütig ein und schickte mich auf die Station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, wo ich für meine Fehltritte Buße tun sollte."
languages.original_text: "I wanted to return to my mentor and share his fate, but the conclave found me repentant and sent me to the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 where I was to atone for my previous transgressions."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wollte zu meinem Mentor zurückkehren und sein Schicksal teilen, doch die Konklave stufte mich als reumütig ein und schickte mich auf die Station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17, wo ich für meine Fehltritte Buße tun sollte."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai voulu rejoindre mon mentor pour subir le même sort que lui, mais le conclave a reconnu mon repentir et m'a envoyé sur la station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 afin que j'y expie mes transgressions. »
languages.original_text: "I wanted to return to my mentor and share his fate, but the conclave found me repentant and sent me to the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 where I was to atone for my previous transgressions."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai voulu rejoindre mon mentor pour subir le même sort que lui, mais le conclave a reconnu mon repentir et m'a envoyé sur la station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 afin que j'y expie mes transgressions. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "I wanted to return to my mentor and share his fate, but the conclave found me repentant and sent me to the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 where I was to atone for my previous transgressions."

languages.text: "Yönderime dönmek ve onunla aynı kaderi paylaşmak istesem de meclis, suçlarımı telafi ettiğim kararını alarak beni daha önceki hatalarımın bedelini ödeyeceğim Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 istasyonuna gönderdi."
languages.original_text: "I wanted to return to my mentor and share his fate, but the conclave found me repentant and sent me to the station Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 where I was to atone for my previous transgressions."

traits.locale_text: "Yönderime dönmek ve onun kaderini paylaşmak istedim ancak meclis suçlarımı telafi ettiğim kararını alarak beni daha önceki hatalarımın bedelini ödeyeceğim Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17 istasyonuna gönderdi."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
